00020 #include <stdarg.h>
00021 using namespace std;
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/time/time.h>
00024 #include "logfile.h"
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 {
00027 
00028 using namespace RDK2::Time;
00029 
00030 LogFile::LogFile(const string& filenamePrefix, bool appendTimeStamp)
00031 {
00032     filename = filenamePrefix;
00033     if (appendTimeStamp) {
00034         Timestamp ts;
00035         filename = filename + ts.getStringRepresentation();
00036     }
00037     filename += ".log";
00038     open(filename.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00039 }
00040 
00041 LogFile::~LogFile()
00042 {
00043     close();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void LogFile::printf(const char* printfFormat, ...)
00047 {
00048     #define BUFSIZE 1024
00049     char buf[BUFSIZE + 1];
00050     
00051     va_list ap;
00052     va_start(ap, printfFormat);
00053     vsnprintf(buf, BUFSIZE, printfFormat, ap);
00054     va_end(ap);
00055 
00056     *this << string(buf);
00057 }
00058 
00059 } // namespace
